scripts.test:runNow:debug: set LOG_LEVEL_RPT=debug && set HEADLESS=False && wdio run ./config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@runNow'
scripts.test:e2eUsers:debug: set LOG_LEVEL_RPT=debug && set HEADLESS=False && wdio run ./config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@e2eUsers'
scripts.test:e2eUsers:silent: set LOG_LEVEL_RPT=silent && set HEADLESS=FALSE && wdio run ./config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@e2eUsers'
scripts.test:e2eUsers:headless: set LOG_LEVEL_RPT=silent && set HEADLESS=True && wdio run ./config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@e2eUsers'
scripts.test:sauceInv:debug: set LOG_LEVEL_RPT=debug && set HEADLESS=False && wdio run ./config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@sauceInv'
scripts.test:sauceInv:info: set LOG_LEVEL_RPT=info && set HEADLESS=False && wdio run ./config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@sauceInv'
scripts.test:sauceInv:headless: set LOG_LEVEL_RPT=silent && set HEADLESS=True && wdio run ./config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@sauceInv'
